What you do not want done to yourself, do not do to others.
A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.

Chinese: 知之者不如好之者，好之者不如乐之者
English: Those who know are not as good as those who love, and those who love are not as good as those who find joy in it.

Chinese: 学而不思则罔，思而不学则殆
English: Learning without thought is labor lost; thought without learning is perilous.

Chinese: 君子坦荡荡，小人长戚戚
English: The superior man is always calm and at ease; the inferior man is always worried and distressed.

Chinese: 天行健，君子以自强不息
English: As Heaven keeps vigor through movement, a gentleman should constantly strive for self-improvement.
Virtue is not left to stand alone. He who practices it will have neighbors.
